title: Grow More Give More: Raised Bed Soil Test

tasks.task: Taking a soil sample for a raised bed garden using a saturated paste test.
subtasks: Gathering necessary materials (container, trowel, ziplock bag, soil sample form).
Excavating soil samples from different parts of the bed at a depth of four inches.
Mixing the collected soil samples in a bag to create a representative sample.
Storing the mixed soil in a box with a ziplock bag to prevent damage during mailing.
Properly filling out the soil sample form with sender's information, field name, crop type, and area.

tasks.task: Verifying whether to sample multiple beds separately based on their performance.
